Vitality Eternal.name: Vitality Eternal
Vitality Eternal.flavor: Your body, mind, and spirit are connected perfectly, shaking off the most debilitating effects.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: If you have one or more effects that a save can end, you immediately successfully save against all those effects.
Vitality Eternal.effect: If you have one or more effects that a save can end, you immediately successfully save against all those effects.
